text: hamane jo rasool bhee bheja, usakee apanee qaum kee bhaasha ke saath hee bheja, taaki vah unake lie achchhee tarah kholakar bayaan kar de. phir allaah jise chaahata hai pathabhrasht rahane deta hai aur jise chaahata hai seedhe maarg par laga deta hai. vah hai bhee prabhutvashaalee, atyant tatvadarshee
